game.name: Jim is Moving Out!
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A physics-based mix of platformer and puzzle game with classical music tunes included. Family friendly, especially in co-op. Help Jim to move-out and see the world!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A physics-based mix of platformer and puzzle game with classical music tunes included. Family friendly, especially in co-op. Help Jim to move-out and see the world!
